actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain subcontractors that incurred losses resulting from the avoidable insufficiency of payment and performance bonds furnished in connection with Corps of Engineers Project DACA 85-88-C-0025 at Eielson Air Force Base, Alaska.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums to named subcontractors in full satisfaction of claims against the United States arising from the failure of U.S. Army Corps of Engineers personnel to exercise diligence in determining the sufficiency of the sureties on the performance and payment bonds furnished to the United States by the named contractor.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain subcontractors that incurred losses resulting from the avoidable insufficiency of payment and performance bonds furnished in connection with Corps of Engineers Project DACA 85-88-C-0025 at Eielson Air Force Base, Alaska.
